articles.description: Increasing exports from global majors Apple, Samsung and other smartphone brands drove locally manufactured shipments, somewhat offsetting the impact of declining demand in India, said Counterpoint Research in a report released Tuesday.
articles.content: Export of locally made smartphones rose to record levels in 2022, contributing 20% in shipment terms, and 30% in value terms, though overall shipments of Made-in-India smartphones fell 3% on-year due… [+2836 chars]

articles.author: Anand Singha
articles.title: Apple launches buy now, pay later service - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The new service allows users to divide their payments into four installments, which will be spread out over six weeks.

articles.title: 2023 Bajaj Pulsar NS160 vs Hero Xtreme 160R: Which 160 cc motorcycle to buy? - HT Auto
articles.description: Hero Xtreme 160R is more affordable than the Bajaj Pulsar NS160, and it also offers more features. The Pulsar is more powerful, but it is also heavier.
articles.content:

articles.author: Sneha Kulkarni
articles.title: Mutual fund nomination deadline of March 31 extended; check details - Economic Times
articles.description: The deadline for submitting nomination details has been extended for mutual fund investors from March 31, 2023, to September 30, 2023.
articles.content: The last date for mutual funds investors to specify nominee details has been extended to September 30, 2023. Earlier the deadline was March 31, 2023. Through a circular on March 28, 2023, the Securit… [+3121 chars]
